channel.title: Got stuck on a wall [Fixed]

item.title: Got stuck on a wall [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: expertmac2
item.description:
Somehow got stuck in a wall while riding the blue platform thingy that goes up and down. Had to reload an earlier save to get out.

EDIT:

This platform seems to be really buggy combined with the ceiling: I got stuck two more times!
